programme.desc: Go West Young Man: Ducking and diving from the Peckham wide boys. After Del manages to sell a rust-bucket of a car, he decides that he and Rodders have earned a night on the town.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Cash and Curry: National treasure of a comedy with Peckham's finest. An opportunity arises for Del to make his fortune, but a missing statue and gang warfare create problems.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Second Time Around: Love comes into Del's life when an old flame returns to London. But Rodney and Grandad are determined to extinguish the torch that Del is carrying.

programme.desc: Slow Bus to Chingford: You can't help but admire Del's flair for enterprise as he ropes in a reluctant Rodney and Grandad into Trotter Watch Security and Trotter's Ethnic Tours.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Russians Are Coming: More ducking and diving as Del and Rodney discover that three tons of lead is not all it appears to be. In fact, it could even be used in case of war.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses

programme.desc: Homesick: Comedy with TV's favourite duckers and divers. Del urges Rodney to use his position as chairman of the Tenants' Association to sort out their lifts.
